name: HogwartsSorting
0:
”Alexa open Hogwarts House Sorting”
”ready”
”i would help my friend and risk my life”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hogwarts house sorting
des: In this Alexa Skill the user will be able to answer 4 questions. Using these 4 questions, they will be able to be sorted into their very own Hogwarts house! There are the 4 basic houses, and 2 additional outcomes including being a Dark Wizard or a Professor.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
